topic.title: Allergies and Intolerances Section (entries required) (V3) - conformance rules

section.p: This section lists and describes any medication allergies, adverse reactions, idiosyncratic reactions, anaphylaxis/anaphylactoid reactions to food items, and metabolic variations or adverse reactions/allergies to other substances (such as latex, iodine, tape adhesives). At a minimum, it should list currently active and any relevant historical allergies and adverse reactions.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7527, CONF:1198-10379, CONF:1198-32545 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Allergies Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32824)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15349)/@code="48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15350, CONF:1198-32140)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-7534)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-7530)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7531, CONF:1198-15446)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present
Conforms to Allergy Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Allergies Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6)
SHALL conform to Allergies Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32824)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15349)/@code="48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15350, CONF:1198-32140)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-7534)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-7530)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7804, CONF:1198-15444)
Conforms to Allergy Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7531, CONF:1198-15446)
Conforms to Allergy Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30:2015-08-01)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7527, CONF:10379 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6.1"
SHALL conform to Allergies Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6)
Consol Allergies Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15349)/@code="48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15350)
Consol Allergies Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7534)
Consol Allergies Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7530)

Consol Allergies Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:7531, CONF:7532) Conforms to Allergy Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30)
